text: "Love Me Tender" is a 1956 song by Elvis Presley and is taken from the 1956 movie of the same name. It went number 1 in Canada and the United States, number 6 in Australia, number 10 in Austria and number 11 in the United Kingdom. It has been covered by numerous artists after its release. ==References== Category:1956 songs Category:1950s ballads Category:Folk ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Elvis Presley songs Category:Percy Sledge songs Category:Amy Grant songs Category:Willie Nelson songs Category:Demis Roussos songs Category:Kenny Rogers songs Category:Linda Ronstadt songs Category:Frank Sinatra songs Category:Richard Chamberlain songs Category:Merle Haggard songs Category:Norah Jones songs Category:Engelbert Humperdinck songs Category:Ricky Nelson songs Category:Nat King Cole songs Category:Cliff Richard songs Category:B.B. title: Love Me Tender (song)
